# Missing values
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(naniar)
library(mi)
summary(rowSums(is.na(new_data1)))
colSums(is.na(new_data1)) %>%
  sort(decreasing = TRUE)

n_var_miss(new_data1)#number of missing variables

miss_var_table(new_data1)
#There are 8 variables with 0 missings, comprising 57.14% of variables in the dataset.
#There is 1 variable with 5302 missings
#There is 1 variable with 18837 missings
```


```{r}
vis_dat(new_data1, warn_large_data=FALSE)
```
```{r}
vis_miss(new_data1, warn_large_data=FALSE)
```

```{r}
gg_miss_var(new_data1, facet = Name)
```
